scripts.env:init: node -e "['infra', 'backend', 'frontend'].forEach(dir => { const fs = require('fs'); const src = './' + dir + '/.env.local'; const dest = './' + dir + '/.env'; if (fs.existsSync(src) && !fs.existsSync(dest)) { fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Created ' + dest) } })"
scripts.dev: npm run env:init && docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml up
